name: DiceDodger
description:
The dice patterns are based on the floor tile you are on, so stay away from the center on odd numbered tiles.

You can only slow down time with SHIFT or SPACE when your green bar is full.

Pick up red hexagons to increase your hp!

See if you can beat my highscore of 124!

No rng was harmed in the making of this game.

Made in 2 days for Mini Jam 95
